alert.note: Alert for Nye (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 10 at 8:16PM PDT until August 10 at 9:15PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 915 PM PDT THIS EVENING FOR EAST CENTRAL NYE COUNTY... At 816 PM PDT, Doppler radar showed that the first thunderstorm had moved north and dissipated, but a second storm over the southern part of the Nevada National Security Site was approaching the area which got heavy rain from the first storm. Flash flooding is still a threat. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... the Nevada National Security Site FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
